ModMetaData.name: GrimWorld 40,000 - Talons of the Emperor
ModMetaData.author: Clashgore, Tittymcswaggy, Alite, Abomination, sk4p3g04t, Sandwish
ModMetaData.description: The Talons of the Emperor, a combination of the Adeptus Custodes and the Sisters of Silence, represent the ultimate Imperial elite in Warhammer 40,000. The Adeptus Custodes, the Emperor's golden guardians, are unmatched in martial skill and loyalty. Their intricate armor and advanced weaponry make them formidable on the battlefield. The Sisters of Silence, clad in black armor, are psychic nulls immune to the warp's influence. They wield efficient weaponry and operate in covert strike teams, targeting enemies with precision. Together, these forces protect the Imperium, ensuring the Emperor's vision endures in the 41st millennium's darkness.
